tool_description: This API provides a simple yet powerful interface for extracting detailed information about movies, TV shows, including season and episode details, descriptions, IMDb ratings, and much more.
name: Movie Database
title: Movie Database

api_list.name: Related TV Shows
api_list.description:
## Related TV Shows Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves a list of related TV shows based on the provided TV show ID.

### Parameters
- **id**: ID of the TV show to find related TV shows for.
- **limit**: (Optional) Limit the number of related TV shows to return. Default is 5.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the list of related TV shows.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `id` (TV show ID) is provided in the query parameters.
- **500 Internal Server Error**: If an unexpected error occurs during the retrieval process.

### Example Request
```http
GET /related/tv-shows?id=456&limit=10

api_list.name: TV Show Description
api_list.description:
## TV Show Description Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves the full description of a TV show based on its ID.

### Parameters
- **id**: ID of the TV show to retrieve the description for.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the full description of the TV show.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `id` (TV show ID) is provided in the query parameters.
- **500 Internal Server Error**: If an unexpected error occurs during the retrieval process.

### Example Request
```http
GET /description/tv-shows?id=123

api_list.name: List Tv Shows
api_list.description:
## List TV Shows Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves a list of TV shows.

### Parameters
- **p**: Page number of the TV shows list.
- **perPage**: (Optional) Number of TV shows per page. Default is 16.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the list of TV shows for the specified page.
- **500 Internal Server Error**: If an unexpected error occurs during the retrieval process.

### Example Request
```http
GET /list/tv-shows/2?perPage=20

api_list.name: Search Tv Shows
api_list.description:
## Search TV Series Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint allows users to search for TV series based on a query.

### Parameters
- **query**: The search query for TV series.
- **limit**: (Optional) Limit the number of results. Default is 8.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the list of TV series matching the search query.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `query` is provided in the query parameters.
- **500 Internal Server Error**: If an unexpected error occurs during the search process.

### Example Request
```http
GET /search/tv-series?query=Game+of+Thrones&limit=10

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query to search for. i.e: NCIS

api_list.name: Top Rated Movies
api_list.description:
## Top Rated Movies Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves a list of top-rated movies.

### Parameters
- **page**: Page number of the top-rated movies list. Default is 1.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the list of top-rated movies.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `page` number is provided in the query parameters.

### Example Request
```http
GET /toprated/movies?page=3

api_list.name: Upcoming Movies
api_list.description:
## Upcoming Movies Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves a list of upcoming movies.

### Parameters
- **page**: Page number of the upcoming movies list. Default is 1.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the list of upcoming movies.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `page` number is provided in the query parameters.

### Example Request
```http
GET /upcoming/movies?page=2

api_list.name: Movie Crew
api_list.description:
## Movie Crew Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves the crew details of a movie based on the provided `movieId`.

### Parameters
- **movieId**: ID of the movie to search for.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the crew details of the movie.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `movieId` is provided in the query parameters.

### Example Request
```http
GET /crew/movies?movieId=505642

api_list.name: Movie Cast
api_list.description:
## Movie Cast Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves the cast of a movie based on the provided `movieId`.

### Parameters
- **movieId**: ID of the movie to search for.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the cast details of the movie.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `movieId` is provided in the query parameters.

### Example Request
```http
GET /cast/movies?movieId=505642

api_list.name: List Movies
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all the movies available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-database21.p.rapidapi.com/list/movies/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-database21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-database21.p.rapidapi.com/list/movies/{p}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-database21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Movie Full Description
api_list.description:
## Movies Full Description Endpoint


### Description
This endpoint retrieves the description of a movie based on the provided `movieId`.

### Parameters
- **movieId**: ID of the movie to search for.

### Responses
- **200 OK**: Returns the description of the movie.
- **400 Bad Request**: If no `movieId` is provided in the query parameters.

### Example Request
```http
GET /description/movies?movieId=505642
